items: All work produced under this contract is the intellectual property of Explorers 33 Group upon final payment.
Cancellation by client post-initiation requires compensation for completed work.
Any external third-party services (stock images, API keys, domains beyond .com) must be pre-approved.
Additional features or page requests beyond agreed scope are billable and require a separate quote.
This document is enforceable under the Commercial Contract Law of Nigeria.
